subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN4761, how did it go?
description_text:
Hello,
 I notice that there are products that have arrived on time.(My friends orders)  My order (CE326636795DE) has not arrived yet. Tomorrow will be a month since the order. And the shipping status from DHL is unchanged from before Christmas. Please choose another courier who can send me the product faster. I have been waiting for the package for a month. My son keeps asking me about the Christmas gift. Please help me with the delivery of the package. 
Thank you

    On Saturday, 10 January 2026 at 15:11:25 EET, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:
